FuncDef:
The redirect observe-port group command configures an action of redirecting packets to an observing port group in a traffic behavior.
The undo redirect observe-port group command deletes the redirection configuration. The redirect observe-port group command configures an action of redirecting packets to an observing port group in a traffic behavior. The undo redirect observe-port group command deletes the redirection configuration. By default, the action of redirecting packets to an observing port group is not configured in a traffic behavior.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an observing port group to which packets are redirected.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 128.

ExtraInfo: You can add a device's ports connected to servers or firewalls to an observing port group and run this command to redirect packets to the observing port group, which simplifies configurations. This action takes effect only for packets forwarded at Layer 2.
